src:
NBA VEČERAS: Bogdanović i Rouz u plus, Rasel u minus
Ljubitelji NBA lige, ali i klađenja imaju razloga za uživanje u najboljoj košarci na svetu

01 Nov 2019

Zahvaljujući činjenici da Amerikanci pomeraju sat nedelju dana nakon nas, ovog vikenda imamo priliku gledati utakmice u nešto ranijem, prihvatljivijem terminu. Tako danas imamo tri utakmice koje počinju u ponoć te još jednu koja kreće pola sata kasnije. Uz još četiri okršaja koja kreću u nešto kasnijem terminu jasno je da ljubitelji NBA lige, ali i klađenja imaju razloga za uživanje u najboljoj košarci na svetu.


DALAS MAVERIKS – LOS ANĐELES LEJKERS (klađenje na utakmicu, tip 2, kvota 1,80)


Dalas je dobro ušao u sezonu, nakon skora 3-1 jasno je da Luka Dončić i Kristaps Porzingis odlično funkcionišu od samog početka zajedničkih igara. Takvim uvodom u sezonu doveli su se do situacije u kojoj se niko ne bi čudio da pobede Lejkerse, ali mislimo da se to ipak neće dogoditi. Lebron Džejms i Entoni Dejvis su se dobro uklopili od početka zajedničke igre i nominalno su jači tandem od onog kojeg Dalas ima. Jasno je da Lejkersi imaju problema s ostatkom ekipe koja nije na nivou ove dvojice, ali ima to i Dalas.

DIANĐELO RASEL (broj poena (26,5), tip manje, kvota 1,85)

U prvoj utakmici nakon što je Stef Kari slomio ruku navijači Golden Stejta će očekivati da glavnu ulogu u napadu preuzme Rasel. On to i te kako može, ali ipak sumnjamo da može ići preko ove granice. U prve četiri utakmice ove sezone Rasel je na prosjeku od 16,3 poena te nikada nije postigao više od 26 poena na jednoj utakmici, a kako Voriorsi noćas igraju protiv San Antonija, koji ima jako puno igrača na bekovskim pozicijama, sigurni smo da će Popović posebnu pažnju dati na čuvanju Rasela. Tu je i opcija da Sparsi rano reše pitanje pobednika pa da starteri sa niti jedne strane uopšte i ne igraju punu minutažu.


BOJAN BOGDANOVIĆ (broj poena (17,5), tip više, kvota 1,85)


Bojan Bogdanović se brzo uklopio u novi klub. Popularni Babo je u prve četiri utakmice za Juta Džez (jednu je preskočio zbog lakše povrede) prosečno ubacivao 21,3 poen uz sjajne postotke od 51,8% ukupnog šuta, 44,4% za trojku dok nije promašio niti jedno slobodno bacanje. Noćas Juta igra protiv Sakramenta koji je u jako lošoj formi pa bi Bogdanović mogao nastaviti s dobrim igrama. Gađajte 'više' posebno preporučujemo jer su ove dve ekipe već igrale ove sezone – Juta je pobedila, a Bogdanović je Kingsima ubacio 26 poena.


DERIK ROUZ (broj poena (17,5), tip više, kvota 1,75)


Rouz je u poslednje dve sezone pronašao svoju igru koju je tražio nakon dve katastrofalne povrede koje su ga gotovo koštale karijere. Lani je u Minesoti bio odličan u prvom delu sezone, a ove je godine u prvih pet utakmica najbolji bek Detroita i to bez obzira što ulazi s klupe. Sjajna statistika od 20,4 poena uz 55,3% šuta i 6,2 asistencija to potvrđuje. Noćas se Rouz vraća u rodni Čikago gde je s Bulsima i došao do MVP titule, a očekujemo da nastavi s odličnim ovosezonskim igrama. I to ne zato što ciljamo na neku "osvetu", već zbog toga što Bulsi imaju dosta lošu obranu što bi Rouz i te kako mogao iskoristiti.
 



 

Piše
: Emir FULURIJA

Foto
: Reuters
text:
NBA Tonight: Bogdanovic and Rose plus, Russell minus
NBA fans and betting fans have reason to enjoy the best basketball in the world

01 Nov 2019

Thanks to the fact that the Americans are moving an hour a week after us, this weekend we have the opportunity to watch the games at a slightly more acceptable date. So today we have three games that start at midnight and another one that starts half an hour later. With four more fights to come later, it is clear that fans of the NBA League and betting have reason to enjoy the best basketball in the world.


Dallas MAVERIKS - LOS ANGELES LAKERS (Match Betting, Type 2, Odds 1.80)


Dallas is well into the season, after a 3-1 score it is clear that Luka Doncic and Kristaps Porzingis have been doing great right from the start of the joint games. Such an introduction to the season has led to a situation where no one would be surprised to beat the Lakers, but we don't think that will happen anyway. Lebron James and Anthony Davis have blended in well since the start of the game and are nominally stronger in tandem than Dallas has. Clearly, the Lakers have a problem with the rest of the team not at the level of the two, but so does Dallas.

DIANGELO RASEL (Points (26.5), Tip Less, Odds 1.85)

In the first game after Stef Kari broke his arm, Golden State fans will expect Russell to take the lead in the attack. He does as well as he can, but we still doubt he can go beyond this border. In his first four games this season, Russell is averaging 16.3 points and has never scored more than 26 points in a single game, and as the Warriors play tonight against San Antonio, which has so many players on the backfield, we are sure Popovic will pay special attention to the care of Russell. There is also an option for Sparsi to resolve the winner early, so that starters on either side do not play full minutes.


BOJAN BOGDANOVIĆ (points (17.5), tip over, odds 1.85)


Bojan Bogdanovic quickly joined the new club. Popular Babo averaged 21.3 points in his first four games for the Utah Jazz (skipping one because of a minor injury) with a staggering percentage of 51.8% of his total shot, 44.4% for the triple while missing one free throw. Tonight, Utah plays against Sacramento, who is in very bad shape, so Bogdanovic could continue playing well. We especially recommend shooting 'more' because the two teams have already played this season - Utah won and Bogdanovic scored 26 points for the Kings.


Derik Rose (points (17.5), tip over, odds 1.75)


For the past two seasons, Rose has found the game he has been looking for after two catastrophic injuries that almost cost him his career. Last year in Minnesota he was excellent in the first part of the season, and this year in the first five games he is Detroit's best running back, no matter what he comes off the bench. Great stats of 20.4 points with 55.3% of shots and 6.2 assists. Tonight, Rose returns to his native Chicago where he came up with the Bulls for the MVP title, and we expect him to continue his excellent games this season. And not because we're aiming for some "revenge", but because the Bulls have a pretty bad defense that Rose and I could use.






It says
: Emir FULURI

Photo
: Reuters
